author: Special Correspondent
text:
Goods worth lakhs were gutted in a fire that broke out in a plastic factory godown in Byatarayanapura on Monday night.

Passersby noticed thick smoke billowing out of the godown and alerted the Fire and Emergency Services personnel. Six fire tenders rushed to the spot and after a five-hour operation, put out the fire.

The godown, which belongs to Renuka Plastic Factory, located in Pantarapalya on Mysuru Road, is used to store raw material. Goods worth lakhs were destroyed but there were no casualties, a senior police officer said, adding that a short circuit may have sparked the fire.
title: Plastic factory godown gutted
